Generate the Nix derivation snippet for Python-R object transfer.

Source: R/rxp_io.R
rxp_common_setup.Rd

This function constructs the build_phase and Nix derivation snippet based on the given parameters.

Usage

rxp_common_setup(out_name, expr_str, nix_env, direction)

Arguments

out_name

Character, name of the derivation.

expr_str

Character, name of the object being transferred.

nix_env

Character, path to the Nix environment file.

direction

Character, either "py2r" (Python to R) or "r2py" (R to Python).

Value

A list with elements: name, snippet, type, additional_files, nix_env.

On this page

Developed by Bruno Rodrigues.
